content: 54 sts or mulltiple of 4 + 2 evenly along the lh edge with cc knit 1 round row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row cuff row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row switch to smaller size small circumference needle row 3-7 repeat row 1 and 2 finishing with a repeat of rounds 1-7 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round row 1 cast off loosely in pattern with larger size needle using larger size needles cast-off in pattern repeat for other sleeve finishing weave in all ends and sew on buttons soak in a good quality wool wash and gently lay flat to dry for pattern support please visit my group on ravelry tikki love or email me at tikkiknits@gmail com you can find me on ravelry as tikki please visit website http //www tikkiknits com au/skill-level html for further information on skill level categories © georgie nicolson 2025 all rights reserved pattern is for personal use only /tikkiknits @tikkiknits www tikkiknits com au © georgie nicolson 2018 all rights reserved
